9.21.20  7:17 am   there's so much about music I have trouble conquering, and there are ways to screw up every tiny step of the way. but other people just seem to understand and execute these things flawlessly... how to cope

Â Â Â Â Â  you must be living on a different planet from me. i have never seen anyone execute any part of music flawlessly

9.21.20  5:52 am   Do you have a favorite fact you've learned from researching for hotewig or have you pretty much dumped all that information from your brain to focus on making new songs

Â Â Â Â Â  the most valuable concept i've taken from that is the remarkable similarity between the progression of computer technology, any kind of technology, human knowledge in general, the human species, any animal species, any living species, the evolution of the stars in the early universe, etc. All these processes seem to follow a strikingly identical pattern, which is to spend what seems like a trillion years figuring almost nothing out until finally one day, somewhere, somehow, a new trick is discovered which suddenly levels up everything and makes everything go many times faster

9.21.20  5:21 am   what will be the resolution of your new video?

Â Â Â Â Â  i haven't decided yet, but what do you think it should be

Â Â Â Â Â  no

9.21.20  4:06 am   9.20.20  10:23 pm AM cirous what events or occurrences lead to your chastisement 

Â Â Â Â Â  accidentally revealing any kind of estimation or hopeful guestimate about when i think i will be able to release a video or song or other item, and then failing. and sometimes, even if i don't give any estimate, people will make up a date and pretend i said it

9.21.20  3:55 am   when is ur next  vid......GIVE AN ESTIMATION.   Millions of people waiting for you to come back

Â Â Â Â Â  start drawing everything you know

9.21.20  1:56 am   If I ask a question will you answer it?

Â Â Â Â Â did you ask first if i would answer that question

         Here my question:

Â Â Â Â Â this would be your second question

     do you think that the world is a dream,

Â Â Â Â Â it has many dream like qualities. or, to look at it a different way, a dream has many world like qualities

      open to our interpretation and forever changing in ways that only the subconscious mind can recognize?

Â Â Â Â Â that's only part of the story. the other part of the story is that some of those changes can be understood by the conscious mind as well

Â Â Â Â Â  press caps lock

9.21.20  1:36 am   9.15.20  2:19 pm When the randomizer picks something that looks like a deliberate themed connection...why not just roll with it?

Â Â Â Â Â because it is not actually a deliberate themed connection, nor does it feel like one

     Incorporate elements of the previous song into the next or intentionally plant other connections? Maybe the randomizer was trying to tell you that repeated weed references would allow you to become the king of stoner music

Â Â Â Â Â  yes, but, on the other hand, what if i didn't want that

Â Â Â Â Â  this is one of the classic techniques of song making. the better a song sounds, the better the listener's perception of the song will actually be
